fields.Title of Presentation: <p style="font-size:11pt;"><b><span style="font-size:12pt;">Becerra, D.</span></b><span style="font-size:12pt;">, Lechuga-Peña, S., Castillo, J., *Perez González, R., *Ciriello, N., *Cervantes, F., & Camacho de Anda, A.  </span><span style="font-size:12pt;">(January, 2023).  “Esto no se lo deseo a nadie”: The impact of immigration detention on Latino immigrants.  Paper presented at the 27<sup>th</sup> Annual Conference of the Society for Social Work and Research.  Phoenix, Arizona.</span></p>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Society for Social Work and Research
